channel.title: Can't log in to server

item.title: Can't log in to server
item.dc:creator: @Continue Continue
item.description:
@Continue wrote:

I’ve added the new log in scroll, and changed a few methods around, re-writing them that is. I can’t seem to log in even though I did set up the login in the processLoginScreenInput() method as well as the drawing of the drawLoginScreen() method. Here’s the methods I changed around:

The processLoginScreenInput() method:

private void processLoginScreenInput() { if(loginScreenState == 0) { if(super.clickMode3 == 1 && super.saveClickX >= 284 && super.saveClickX <= 471 && super.saveClickY >= 112 && super.saveClickY <= 137 && loginScreenState == 0) { loginScreenState = 1; loginMessage1 = "Please enter your username and password"; //Login Screen loginMessage2 = ""; loginScreenCursorPos = 0; if(loginScreenState == 1) { if(super.clickMode3 == 1 && super.saveClickX >= 311 && super.saveClickX <= 449 && super.saveClickY >= 233 && super.saveClickY <= 248) { loginScreenCursorPos = 0; myUsername = ""; myPassword = ""; } else if(super.clickMode3 == 1 && super.saveClickX >= 311 && super.saveClickX <= 449 && super.saveClickY >= 293 && super.saveClickY <= 308) { loginScreenCursorPos = 1; } if(super.clickMode3 == 1 && super.saveClickX >= 354 && super.saveClickX <= 400 && super.saveClickY >= 329 && super.saveClickY <= 338) { loginFailures = 0; login(myUsername, myPassword, false); if(loggedIn) { return; } } else if(super.clickMode3 == 1 && super.saveClickX >= 334 && super.saveClickX <= 419 && super.saveClickY >= 367 && super.saveClickY <= 379) { loginScreenState = 0; //Return to loginScreenState = 0; Main Menu } do { int l1 = readChar(-796); if(l1 == -1) break; boolean flag1 = false; for(int i2 = 0; i2 < validUserPassChars.length(); i2++) { if(l1 != validUserPassChars.charAt(i2)) continue; flag1 = true; break; } if(loginScreenCursorPos == 0) { if(l1 == 8 && myUsername.length() > 0) myUsername = myUsername.substring(0, myUsername.length() - 1); if(l1 == 9 || l1 == 10 || l1 == 13) loginScreenCursorPos = 1; if(flag1) myUsername += (char)l1; if(myUsername.length() > 12) myUsername = myUsername.substring(0, 12); } else if(loginScreenCursorPos == 1) { if(l1 == 8 && myPassword.length() > 0) myPassword = myPassword.substring(0, myPassword.length() - 1); if(l1 == 9 || l1 == 10 || l1 == 13) login(myUsername, myPassword, false); if(flag1) myPassword += (char)l1; if(myPassword.length() > 20) myPassword = myPassword.substring(0, 20); } } while(true); return; } } else if(super.clickMode3 == 1 && super.saveClickX >= 284 && super.saveClickX <= 471 && super.saveClickY >= 141 && super.saveClickY <= 166) { loginScreenState = 2; //CharacterSelect Screen if(loginScreenState == 2) { if(super.clickMode3 == 1 && super.saveClickX >= 94 && super.saveClickX <= 245 && super.saveClickY >= 439 && super.saveClickY <= 452) { loginScreenState = 0; } else if(super.clickMode3 == 1 && super.saveClickX >= 434 && super.saveClickX <= 649 && super.saveClickY >= 439 && super.saveClickY <= 451) { characterCreateScreen = 1; } else if(super.clickMode3 == 1 && super.saveClickX >= 249 && super.saveClickX <= 434 && super.saveClickY >= 124 && super.saveClickY <= 143) { loadUsernameCHAR = true; } else if(super.clickMode3 == 1 && super.saveClickX >= 249 && super.saveClickX <= 434 && super.saveClickY >= 174 && super.saveClickY <= 193) { loadPasswordCHAR = true; } } } else if(super.clickMode3 == 1 && super.saveClickX >= 329 && super.saveClickX <= 426 && super.saveClickY >= 179 && super.saveClickY <= 192) { loginScreenState = 3; //WorldSelect Screen if(loginScreenState == 3) { if(super.clickMode3 == 1 && super.saveClickX >= 688 && super.saveClickX <= 711 && super.saveClickY >= 83 && super.saveClickY <= 105) { loginScreenState = 0; //Return to loginScreenState = 0; Main Menu } } } else if(super.clickMode3 == 1 && super.saveClickX >= 307 && super.saveClickX <= 364 && super.saveClickY >= 230 && super.saveClickY <= 265) { drawCheckMarkOnSD = true; drawCheckMarkOnHD = false; } else if(super.clickMode3 == 1 && super.saveClickX >= 384 && super.saveClickX <= 441 && super.saveClickY >= 230 && super.saveClickY <= 265) { drawCheckMarkOnHD = true; drawCheckMarkOnSD = false; } else if(super.clickMode3 == 1 && super.saveClickX >= 311 && super.saveClickX <= 443 && super.saveClickY >= 216 && super.saveClickY <= 232) { loginScreenState = 4; //GraphicsOptions Screen if(loginScreenState == 4) { if(super.clickMode3 == 1 && super.saveClickX >= 576 && super.saveClickX <= 599 && super.saveClickY >= 106 && super.saveClickY <= 128) { loginScreenState = 0; //Return to loginScreenState = 0; Main Menu } else if(super.clickMode3 == 1 && super.saveClickX >= 333 && super.saveClickX <= 386 && super.saveClickY >= 236 && super.saveClickY <= 281) { if(normalScreen || fullScreen) { setMidScreen(); //Set midScreen boolean } } else if(super.clickMode3 == 1 && super.saveClickX >= 243 && super.saveClickX <= 296 && super.saveClickY >= 236 && super.saveClickY <= 281) { if(midScreen || fullScreen) { setNormalScreen(); //Set normalScreen boolean } } else if(super.clickMode3 == 1 && super.saveClickX >= 423 && super.saveClickX <= 476 && super.saveClickY >= 236 && super.saveClickY <= 281) { if(normalScreen || midScreen) { setFullScreen(); //Set fullScreen boolean } } } } else if(super.clickMode3 == 1 && super.saveClickX >= 321 && super.saveClickX <= 432 && super.saveClickY >= 295 && super.saveClickY <= 311) { loginScreenState = 5; //AudioOptions Screen if(loginScreenState == 5) { if(super.clickMode3 == 1 && super.saveClickX >= 322 && super.saveClickX <= 337 && super.saveClickY >= 317 && super.saveClickY <= 332) { clickAndDrawStereoOptions = true; clickAndDrawMonoOptions = false; } else if(super.clickMode3 == 1 && super.saveClickX >= 412 && super.saveClickX <= 427 && super.saveClickY >= 317 && super.saveClickY <= 332) { clickAndDrawMonoOptions = true; clickAndDrawStereoOptions = false; } } } else if(super.clickMode3 == 1 && super.saveClickX >= 360 && super.saveClickX <= 393 && super.saveClickY >= 372 && super.saveClickY <= 386) { System.exit(0); //Quit Screen } } else if(loginScreenState == 1 || loginScreenState == 2 || loginScreenState == 3 || loginScreenState == 4 || loginScreenState == 5) { if(super.clickMode3 == 1 && super.saveClickX >= 334 && super.saveClickX <= 419 && super.saveClickY >= 345 && super.saveClickY <= 357) { loginScreenState = 0; //Return to loginScreenState = 0; Main Menu } } }

The drawLoginScreen() method:

private void drawLoginScreen() { resetImageProducers(); loginArea.initDrawingArea(); titleBox.drawSprite(229, 67); byte abyte0[] = titleStreamLoader.getDataForName("title.dat"); Sprite sprite = new Sprite(abyte0, this); if(loginScreenState == 0) { //Main Screen sprite.drawSprite(0, 0); BACKGROUND.drawSprite(0, 0); LOGO.drawSprite(231, 30); titleBox.drawSprite(231, 67); BUTTONS[10].drawSprite(280, 110); BUTTONS[8].drawSprite(280, 141); BUTTONS[30].drawSprite(325, 169); smallText.drawText(0, "Favorites:", 202, 325); BUTTONRED.drawSprite(370, 192); BUTTONRED.drawSprite(410, 192); LINE.drawSprite(291, 204); BUTTONS[29].drawSprite(307, 209); BUTTONS[18].drawSprite(307, 230); BUTTONS[19].drawSprite(384, 230); if(drawCheckMarkOnSD) { BUTTONS[20].drawSprite(352, 253); } else if(drawCheckMarkOnHD) { BUTTONS[20].drawSprite(429, 253); drawCheckMarkOnSD = false; } smallText.drawText(0, "Standard Detail", 279, 335); smallText.drawText(0, "High Detail", 279, 413); LINE.drawSprite(291, 282); BUTTONS[31].drawSprite(317, 288); BUTTONS[26].drawSprite(291, 305); BUTTONS[27].drawSprite(315, 306); smallText.drawText(0, "Music Volume", 341, 376); LINE.drawSprite(291, 343); BUTTONS[32].drawSprite(356, 348); } else if(loginScreenState == 1) { //Login Screen sprite.drawSprite(0, 0); BACKGROUND.drawSprite(0, 0); LOGO.drawSprite(231, 30); titleBox.drawSprite(231, 67); BUTTONS[0].drawSprite(327, 115); smallText.drawText(0xFFEBC2, "Enter your username and password", 155, 372); BUTTONS[1].drawSprite(340, 175); BUTTONS[5].drawSprite(285, 200); BUTTONS[2].drawSprite(340, 245); BUTTONS[5].drawSprite(285, 260); BUTTONS[3].drawSprite(350, 305); BUTTONS[6].drawSprite(330, 343); regularFont.drawShadowedText(false, 306, 0x471E01, myUsername + ((loginScreenCursorPos == 0) & (loopCycle % 40 < 20) ? "|" : ""), 222); regularFont.drawShadowedText(false, 306, 0x471E01, TextClass.passwordAsterisks(myPassword) + ((loginScreenCursorPos == 1) & (loopCycle % 40 < 20) ? "|" : ""), 284); } else if(loginScreenState == 2) { //CharacterSelection Screen if(characterCreateScreen == 0) { sprite.drawSprite(0, 0); BACKGROUND.drawSprite(0, 0); LOGO.drawSprite(231, 30); CHARACTER[8].drawSprite(1, 5); CHARACTER[5].drawSprite(300, 70); boldFont.drawText(0x663300, "1.", 110, 60); boldFont.drawText(0, "Your Username:", 110, 125); CHARACTER[0].drawSprite(245, 100); if(loadUsernameCHAR) { CHARACTER[6].drawSprite(435, 120); } boldFont.drawText(0x663300, "2.", 160, 60); boldFont.drawText(0, "Your Password:", 160, 125); CHARACTER[0].drawSprite(245, 150); if(loadPasswordCHAR) { CHARACTER[7].drawSprite(435, 120); } boldFont.drawText(0x663300, "3.", 210, 60); boldFont.drawText(0, "Re-enter Your Password:", 210, 154); CHARACTER[0].drawSprite(245, 200); boldFont.drawText(0x663300, "4.", 260, 60); boldFont.drawText(0, "Your Date of Birth:", 260, 131); CHARACTER[0].drawSprite(245, 250); boldFont.drawText(0x663300, "5.", 310, 60); boldFont.drawText(0, "Your Country of ", 310, 125); boldFont.drawText(0, "Residence:", 325, 125); CHARACTER[0].drawSprite(245, 300); DrawingArea.drawLine(405, 0x663300, 650, 58); CHARACTER[1].drawSprite(90, 415); CHARACTER[3].drawSprite(430, 415); } else if(characterCreateScreen == 1) { sprite.drawSprite(0, 0); BACKGROUND.drawSprite(0, 0); LOGO.drawSprite(231, 30); CHARACTER[8].drawSprite(1, 5); CHARACTER[5].drawSprite(300, 30); boldFont.drawText(0x663300, "5.", 350, 295); boldFont.drawText(0, "Email Address (optional):", 350, 295); boldFont.drawText(0, "Your Email:", 350, 295); CHARACTER[1].drawSprite(150, 50); boldFont.drawText(0, "Re-enter Your Email:", 350, 295); CHARACTER[1].drawSprite(150, 50); boldFont.drawText(0x663300, "6.", 350, 295); boldFont.drawText(0, "Email Options:", 350, 295); CHARACTER[13].drawSprite(50, 270); boldFont.drawText(0, "I do NOT wish to receive email newsletters", 350, 295); boldFont.drawText(0, "from Josh or any other Administrators and Moderators about", 350, 295); boldFont.drawText(0, "Runite-Age, including information on new game features and", 350, 295); boldFont.drawText(0, "special offers.", 350, 295); CHARACTER[13].drawSprite(50, 320); boldFont.drawText(0, "I do NOT wish to receive email newsletters from", 350, 295); boldFont.drawText(0, "Josh or any other Administrators and Moderators about", 350, 295); boldFont.drawText(0, "its other games and products, including information on", 350, 295); boldFont.drawText(0, "special offers.", 350, 295); DrawingArea.drawLine(490, 0x663300, 504, 7); CHARACTER[13].drawSprite(50, 320); boldFont.drawText(0x663300, "7.", 350, 295); boldFont.drawText(0, "I have read and agree with the Privacy Policy.", 350, 295); CHARACTER[13].drawSprite(50, 320); boldFont.drawText(0x663300, "8.", 350, 295); boldFont.drawText(0, "I have read and agree with the Terms and Conditions.", 350, 295); DrawingArea.drawLine(490, 0x663300, 504, 7); CHARACTER[14].drawSprite(50, 470); CHARACTER[16].drawSprite(370, 470); } } else if(loginScreenState == 3) { //WorldSelect Screen sprite.drawSprite(0, 0); BACKGROUND.drawSprite(0, 0); WORLDSSELECT[0].drawSprite(5, 5); WORLDSSELECT[1].drawSprite(279, 52); WORLDSSELECT[3].drawSprite(684, 59); regularFont.drawText(0, "Refresh", 78, 106); boldFont.drawText(0xFFFFFF, "World", 115, 116); boldFont.drawText(0xFFFFFF, "Players", 115, 187); regularFont.drawText(0, "Please choose a game world from the list.", 90, 381); boldFont.drawText(0xFFFFFF, "Activity / Location", 115, 384); regularFont.drawText(0, "Current World:", 66, 608); regularFont.drawText(0, "World: Runite-Age", 81, 613); boldFont.drawText(0xFFFFFF, "Type", 115, 615); boldFont.drawText(0xFFFFFF, "Ping", 115, 675); WORLDSSELECT[13].drawSprite(99, 119); WORLDSSELECT[11].drawSprite(119, 119); WORLDSSELECT[13].drawSprite(173, 119); WORLDSSELECT[11].drawSprite(192, 119); WORLDSSELECT[13].drawSprite(369, 119); WORLDSSELECT[11].drawSprite(389, 119); WORLDSSELECT[10].drawSprite(452, 108); WORLDSSELECT[15].drawSprite(552, 102); WORLDSSELECT[13].drawSprite(547, 119); WORLDSSELECT[11].drawSprite(562, 119); WORLDSSELECT[13].drawSprite(599, 119); WORLDSSELECT[11].drawSprite(620, 119); WORLDSSELECT[10].drawSprite(638, 108); WORLDSSELECT[13].drawSprite(659, 119); WORLDSSELECT[11].drawSprite(675, 119); WORLDSSELECT[7].drawSprite(62, 170); WORLDSSELECT[20].drawSprite(62, 188); WORLDSSELECT[7].drawSprite(62, 206); WORLDSSELECT[5].drawSprite(82, 167); WORLDSSELECT[6].drawSprite(82, 185); WORLDSSELECT[5].drawSprite(82, 203); WORLDSSELECT[22].drawSprite(213, 179); WORLDSSELECT[23].drawSprite(213, 197); WORLDSSELECT[24].drawSprite(213, 215); boldFont.drawText(0xFFFFFF, "Favorite World (max 2)", 162, 133); regularFont.drawText(0xFFFFFF, "World 1", 180, 124); regularFont.drawText(0xFFFFFF, "World 2", 198, 124); regularFont.drawText(0xFFFFFF, "World 3", 216, 124); regularFont.drawText(0xFFFFFF, "IDK", 180, 186); regularFont.drawText(0xFFFFFF, "IDK", 198, 186); regularFont.drawText(0xFFFFFF, "IDK", 216, 186); regularFont.drawText(0xFFFFFF, "U.S.", 178, 379); regularFont.drawText(0xFFFFFF, "Australia", 198, 380); regularFont.drawText(0xFFFFFF, "U.K.", 216, 379); WORLDSSELECT[16].drawSprite(552, 168); WORLDSSELECT[16].drawSprite(552, 186); WORLDSSELECT[16].drawSprite(552, 204); WORLDSSELECT[25].drawSprite(552, 213); WORLDSSELECT[25].drawSprite(552, 231); WORLDSSELECT[25].drawSprite(552, 249); WORLDSSELECT[5].drawSprite(578, 167); WORLDSSELECT[6].drawSprite(578, 185); WORLDSSELECT[5].drawSprite(578, 203); regularFont.drawText(0xFFFFFF, "Free", 180, 623); regularFont.drawText(0xFFFFFF, "Members", 198, 629); regularFont.drawText(0xFFFFFF, "Free", 216, 623); regularFont.drawText(0xFFFFFF, "1", 180, 697); regularFont.drawText(0xFFFFFF, "2", 198, 697); regularFont.drawText(0xFFFFFF, "3", 216, 697); } else if(loginScreenState == 4) { //GraphicsOptions Screen sprite.drawSprite(0, 0); BACKGROUND.drawSprite(0, 0); GRAPHICSOPTIONS.drawSprite(70, 20); } else if(loginScreenState == 5) { //AudioOptions Screen sprite.drawSprite(0, 0); BACKGROUND.drawSprite(0, 0); LOGO.drawSprite(231, 30); titleBox.drawSprite(231, 67); BUTTONS[31].drawSprite(317, 116); boldFont.drawText(0x5E1919, "Music Volume", 152, 372); BUTTONS[26].drawSprite(295, 160); BUTTONS[27].drawSprite(319, 162); boldFont.drawText(0x5E1919, "Sound Effects Volume", 205, 374); BUTTONS[26].drawSprite(295, 211); BUTTONS[27].drawSprite(319, 213); boldFont.drawText(0x5E1919, "Area Sounds Volume", 255, 374); BUTTONS[26].drawSprite(295, 261); BUTTONS[27].drawSprite(319, 263); AUDIOBUTTONS[2].drawSprite(314, 300); AUDIOBUTTONS[1].drawSprite(398, 300); AUDIOBUTTONS[0].drawSprite(322, 317); AUDIOBUTTONS[0].drawSprite(412, 317); if(clickAndDrawMonoOptions) { AUDIOBUTTONS[3].drawSprite(325, 320); } else if(clickAndDrawStereoOptions) { AUDIOBUTTONS[3].drawSprite(415, 320); } BUTTONS[6].drawSprite(330, 343); } loginArea.drawGraphics(0, super.graphics, 0); }

Help is appreciated.
